explanation.title: A Short Explanation
explanation.content:
You are about to open the shop's website. You can freely browse and purchase the products you want.
The website will remember that you arrived from CharityDiscount for a few days (only on this device).
Shortly after your purchase, your cashback will show up in CharityDiscount (you will also be notified).
Initially, the cashback will be in a pending state for a few days (usually between 14 and 60) and after that, if you haven't returned the products, it will become available.
explanation.disableExplanation: I don't need to see this again
